name: Pizza Bounce
description:
Pizza Bounce: The concept of the game take places in a pizza kitchen where two pizza chefs have gotten into a food fight. The only way to settle this fight is to see who will be the last man standing.

Going with the theme of pizza the level will be designed around a kitchen of sorts that allows for the chefs to run and jump onto things scattered around the kitchen. Again with the theme of pizza and being in a kitchen the projectiles the chef's will throw will be pizza related condiments/toppings.
